title: travelplanner: Please create a 3-day itinerary for a group of 3 departing from Fort Wayne and heading to Charlotte, spanning from March 8th to March 10th, 2022. We have a budget of $1,900. Our group will need to find accommodations that allow pets and provide entire rooms. We would also prefer a journey that doesn't involve any flights. (e597d5fffaa1a4c4)

always_included_messages.content: Based on the user's query, make the best travel plan for the user and save it. Do not ask follow-up questions.

chat_history.content: Please create a 3-day itinerary for a group of 3 departing from Fort Wayne and heading to Charlotte, spanning from March 8th to March 10th, 2022. We have a budget of $1,900. Our group will need to find accommodations that allow pets and provide entire rooms. We would also prefer a journey that doesn't involve any flights.

function.name: delegate
function.arguments: {"instructions":"Find a suitable mode of transportation from Fort Wayne to Charlotte that does not involve flights. Consider options like trains, buses, or car rentals."}

chat_history.content:
Driving from Fort Wayne to Charlotte is a viable option. Here are the details:

- **Distance**: 938 km
- **Estimated Duration**: 9 hours 15 minutes
- **Estimated Cost**: $46 (for fuel)

If you prefer other modes of transportation like trains or buses, I can look up those options for you as well. Would you like me to proceed with that?

function.name: delegate
function.arguments: {"instructions":"Find popular attractions, restaurants for breakfast, lunch, and dinner in Charlotte for a 3-day itinerary from March 8th to March 10th, 2022."}

chat_history.content:
Here's a 3-day itinerary for Charlotte, including popular attractions and dining options for breakfast, lunch, and dinner:

### Day 1: March 8th, 2022
#### Attractions:
1. **Freedom Park**
   - Address: 1908 East Blvd, Charlotte, NC 28203
   - Phone: (980) 314-1002

2. **Levine Museum of the New South**
   - Address: 401 S Tryon St, Charlotte, NC 28202
   - Phone: (704) 333-1887
   - Website: [museumofthenewsouth.org](http://www.museumofthenewsouth.org/)

3. **Discovery Place Science**
   - Address: 301 N Tryon St, Charlotte, NC 28202
   - Phone: (704) 327-2189
   - Website: [discoveryplace.org](http://discoveryplace.org/)

#### Dining:
- **Breakfast:** Olive Tree Cafe
  - Cuisines: Tea, Chinese, Desserts
  - Average Cost: $23
  - Rating: 4.6

- **Lunch:** Central Perk 7
  - Cuisines: Pizza, Bakery, BBQ, Fast Food
  - Average Cost: $87
  - Rating: 4.5

- **Dinner:** Unplugged Courtyard
  - Cuisines: Desserts, French, Bakery, Cafe, Seafood
  - Average Cost: $54
  - Rating: 4.0

### Day 2: March 9th, 2022
#### Attractions:
1. **NASCAR Hall of Fame**
   - Address: 400 E M.L.K. Jr Blvd, Charlotte, NC 28202
   - Phone: (704) 654-4400
   - Website: [nascarhall.com](http://www.nascarhall.com/)

2. **The Mint Museum**
   - Address: 2730 Randolph Rd, Charlotte, NC 28207
   - Phone: (704) 337-2000
   - Website: [mintmuseum.org](http://www.mintmuseum.org/)

3. **Bechtler Museum of Modern Art**
   - Address: 420 S Tryon St, Charlotte, NC 28202
   - Phone: (704) 353-9209
   - Website: [bechtler.org](http://bechtler.org/)

#### Dining:
- **Breakfast:** Cafe Maple Street
  - Cuisines: Fast Food, Tea, Italian
  - Average Cost: $91
  - Rating: 3.5

- **Lunch:** Kylin Skybar
  - Cuisines: Tea, Cafe, Pizza, Italian
  - Average Cost: $44
  - Rating: 3.6

- **Dinner:** Grover's - The Baker Shop
  - Cuisines: Pizza, Bakery, Chinese, Indian, Seafood
  - Average Cost: $30
  - Rating: 3.0

### Day 3: March 10th, 2022
#### Attractions:
1. **The Charlotte Museum of History**
   - Address: 3500 Shamrock Dr, Charlotte, NC 28215
   - Phone: (704) 568-1774
   - Website: [charlottemuseum.org](http://www.charlottemuseum.org/)

2. **Ray’s Splash Planet**
   - Address: 215 N Sycamore St, Charlotte, NC 28202
   - Phone: (980) 314-4729
   - Website: [mecknc.gov](https://www.mecknc.gov/ParkandRec/Aquatics/RaysSplashPlanet/Pages/default.aspx)

3. **UNC Charlotte Botanical Gardens**
   - Address: 9090 Craver Rd, Charlotte, NC 28262
   - Phone: (704) 687-0721
   - Website: [gardens.uncc.edu](http://gardens.uncc.edu/)

#### Dining:
- **Breakfast:** Prince Snacks & Momo's Point
  - Cuisines: Tea, Cafe, Desserts, Fast Food
  - Average Cost: $11
  - Rating: 3.4

- **Lunch:** China Garden
  - Cuisines: Tea, Mexican, BBQ, Mediterranean
  - Average Cost: $14
  - Rating: 3.8

- **Dinner:** Nagaland's Kitchen
  - Cuisines: Pizza, American, Desserts
  - Average Cost: $73
  - Rating: 3.8

Enjoy your trip to Charlotte!

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.
instructions.title: Instructions

functions.name: submit_day_plan
functions.desc:
Once you have collected information about the trip, call this function once for each day of the trip, starting on day 1.
If a field does not apply for a given day, use "-" to indicate this.
You MUST call this function to save the plan for each query.

current_city.description: The city for this day. If the plan is to travel between two cities, indicate it as "from A to B" (e.g. "from Ithaca to Charlotte").
current_city.title: Current City

transportation.description: e.g. "Flight Number: F3633413, from Ithaca to Charlotte, Departure Time: 05:38, Arrival Time: 07:46"
transportation.title: Transportation

breakfast.description: The name of a restaurant in the city, e.g. "Nagaland's Kitchen, Charlotte"
breakfast.title: Breakfast

attraction.description: Use a ";" to separate different attractions, with each attraction formatted as "Name, City". e.g. "The Charlotte Museum of History, Charlotte;"
attraction.title: Attraction

accommodation.description: e.g. "Affordable Spacious Refurbished Room in Bushwick!, Charlotte"
accommodation.title: Accommodation

chat_history.content: Find a suitable mode of transportation from Fort Wayne to Charlotte that does not involve flights. Consider options like trains, buses, or car rentals.
self-driving, from Fort Wayne to Charlotte, duration: 9 hours 15 mins, distance: 938 km, cost: 46

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.
instructions.title: Instructions

functions.name: accommodation_search
functions.desc:
Discover accommodations in your desired city.
Example: accommodation_search("Rome") would present a list of hotel rooms in Rome.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking accommodation.
city.title: City

functions.name: attraction_search
functions.desc:
Find attractions in a city of your choice.
Example: attraction_search("London") would return attractions in London.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking attractions.
city.title: City

functions.name: city_search
functions.desc:
Find cities in a state of your choice.
Example: city_search("California") would return cities in California.

state.description: The name of the state where you're seeking cities.
state.title: State

functions.name: flight_search
functions.desc:
A flight information retrieval tool.
Example: flight_search("New York", "London", "2022-10-01") would fetch flights from New York to London on October 1, 2022.

departure_city.description: The city you'll be flying out from.
departure_city.title: Departure City

destination_city.description: The city you aim to reach.
destination_city.title: Destination City

date.description: The date of your travel in YYYY-MM-DD format.
date.title: Date

functions.name: google_distance_matrix
functions.desc:
Estimate the distance, time and cost between two cities.
Example: google_distance_matrix("Paris", "Lyon", "self-driving") would provide driving distance, time and cost between Paris and Lyon.

origin.description: The departure city of your journey.
origin.title: Origin

destination.description: The destination city of your journey.
destination.title: Destination

functions.name: restaurant_search
functions.desc:
Explore dining options in a city of your choice.
Example: restaurant_search("Tokyo") would show a curated list of restaurants in Tokyo.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking restaurants.
city.title: City

#### Attractions:
1. **The Charlotte Museum of History**
   - Address: 3500 Shamrock Dr, Charlotte, NC 28215
   - Phone: (704) 568-1774
   - Website: [charlottemuseum.org](http://www.charlottemuseum.org/)

2. **Ray’s Splash Planet**
   - Address: 215 N Sycamore St, Charlotte, NC 28202
   - Phone: (980) 314-4729
   - Website: [mecknc.gov](https://www.mecknc.gov/ParkandRec/Aquatics/RaysSplashPlanet/Pages/default.aspx)

3. **UNC Charlotte Botanical Gardens**
   - Address: 9090 Craver Rd, Charlotte, NC 28262
   - Phone: (704) 687-0721
   - Website: [gardens.uncc.edu](http://gardens.uncc.edu/)

#### Dining:
- **Breakfast:** Prince Snacks & Momo's Point
  - Cuisines: Tea, Cafe, Desserts, Fast Food
  - Average Cost: $11
  - Rating: 3.4

- **Lunch:** China Garden
  - Cuisines: Tea, Mexican, BBQ, Mediterranean
  - Average Cost: $14
  - Rating: 3.8

- **Dinner:** Nagaland's Kitchen
  - Cuisines: Pizza, American, Desserts
  - Average Cost: $73
  - Rating: 3.8

Enjoy your trip to Charlotte!

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.
instructions.title: Instructions

functions.name: accommodation_search
functions.desc:
Discover accommodations in your desired city.
Example: accommodation_search("Rome") would present a list of hotel rooms in Rome.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking accommodation.
city.title: City

functions.name: attraction_search
functions.desc:
Find attractions in a city of your choice.
Example: attraction_search("London") would return attractions in London.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking attractions.
city.title: City

functions.name: city_search
functions.desc:
Find cities in a state of your choice.
Example: city_search("California") would return cities in California.

state.description: The name of the state where you're seeking cities.
state.title: State

functions.name: flight_search
functions.desc:
A flight information retrieval tool.
Example: flight_search("New York", "London", "2022-10-01") would fetch flights from New York to London on October 1, 2022.

departure_city.description: The city you'll be flying out from.
departure_city.title: Departure City

destination_city.description: The city you aim to reach.
destination_city.title: Destination City

date.description: The date of your travel in YYYY-MM-DD format.
date.title: Date

functions.name: google_distance_matrix
functions.desc:
Estimate the distance, time and cost between two cities.
Example: google_distance_matrix("Paris", "Lyon", "self-driving") would provide driving distance, time and cost between Paris and Lyon.

origin.description: The departure city of your journey.
origin.title: Origin

destination.description: The destination city of your journey.
destination.title: Destination

functions.name: restaurant_search
functions.desc:
Explore dining options in a city of your choice.
Example: restaurant_search("Tokyo") would show a curated list of restaurants in Tokyo.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking restaurants.
city.title: City
